head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HALPERN, SEYMOUR (TED), D.D.S.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HALPERN, SEYMOUR (TED), D.D.S.

block.p: HALPERN-Seymour (Ted), D.D.S. Age 77. On August 5, 2000. Loving husband of Bernice (Rogoff). Devoted father of Peter and Sue (Bill) McKibben and proud grandfather of Sophie McKibben. Cherished brother of Gerald and Arthur (deceased). Services Tuesday, August 8, 2000, at Collins Funeral Home, Norwalk, CT.
